data.name: AFTERSHOCK
data.detailed_description:
PC PowerPlay

"A Game To Look Out For"


About the Game

Created and Developed by indie company Focus Studios, AfterShock is an Open World/MMO/FPS game

LORE TO BE ADDED HERE SHORTLY!

This is YOUR story!

"Someone once asked me if I remembered how it all went down, as if it happened so long ago that anyone could forget, so yeah I remember, I remember when our streets and homes turned into war zones, I remember when the world went dark, I remember when they tried to contain it as if it was ever going to stop anything, I remember when we worked together instead of killing, so yeah I remember how it all went down, but none of that matters anymore, I'm a killer, a survivor, and nothing will ever stop me from out living the AfterShock."
data.about_the_game:
Created and Developed by indie company Focus Studios, AfterShock is an Open World/MMO/FPS game

LORE TO BE ADDED HERE SHORTLY!

"Someone once asked me if I remembered how it all went down, as if it happened so long ago that anyone could forget, so yeah I remember, I remember when our streets and homes turned into war zones, I remember when the world went dark, I remember when they tried to contain it as if it was ever going to stop anything, I remember when we worked together instead of killing, so yeah I remember how it all went down, but none of that matters anymore, I'm a killer, a survivor, and nothing will ever stop me from out living the AfterShock."
data.short_description:
AfterShock is an EARLY ACCESS Open World Multiplayer Survival Game, the game is shaped and crafted by YOU, The Community!
Running on Unreal Engine 4.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher; 32 bit version
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any SoundCard from the past 10 years
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher; 64 bit version
  • Processor: Intel Kaby Lake Core i5 7400 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 4 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any SoundCard from the past 5 years
